模块 com.ae2dms.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature

类 Hero

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.UpdatableObject
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Creature
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Hero
所有已实现的接口:
Alive, Updatable
public class Hero extends Creature
Hero is a GameObject that is controllable by the player. Of all the main.com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.World.GameObject, only com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Map.Beings.Hero has KeyBindings. com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Map.Beings.Hero can shoot HeroProjectiles, shield from attacks, trigger a special attack and collect Fruits for points.
另请参阅:
HeroCollide

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Hero

      public Hero​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      The constructor to initialize the Hero
      参数:
      world - indicates where to add the object
      colNum - indicates the unit horizontal coordination
      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination
